The corresponding Pit tag numbers are: 0A00073053, male, 311 mm SL, 364 mm TL, 500 g, tubercles developed, ripe and running; 0A00074604, female, 354 mm SL, 408 mm TL, 760 g, no loss of mucus, gravid. The dry specimens are scales and both the scales and the fin clips are separated within the bag/jar by their ID numbers which are the last 5 digits of the Pit tag number.
